author: cnbc.com
title: LCNB Corp. Declares Second Quarter Dividend
text:
LEBANON, Ohio--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- LCNB Corp. (Nasdaq: LCNB) The Board of Directors of LCNB Corp., at their meeting on Monday, May 21, 2018 declared a Second Quarter Dividend of $.16 per share on the companyâ€™s common stock. The dividend will be paid on June 15, 2018 to shareholders of record June 1, 2018.
LCNB Corp. is a financial holding company headquartered in Lebanon, Ohio. LCNB National Bank is its wholly-owned FDIC insured subsidiary with 34 offices located in Butler, Clinton, Clermont, Fayette, Franklin, Hamilton, Montgomery, Preble, Ross, and Warren Counties, Ohio. Additional information about LCNB Corp. and information about products and services offered by LCNB National Bank can be found on the Internet at www.LCNB.com .
